<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Wadjet (The Green Empress)](/Deities.aspx?ID=62)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Defend your homelands and your people, aid childbirths, grow papyrus, protect sources of clean water

**Anathema** Refuse to help a drowning creature, harm a rightful ruler

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5)

**Domains** [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Mage Armor](/Spells.aspx?ID=176)

- **2nd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=10)
(snake only)

- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125)

</column>
name: Wadjet (The Green Empress)
